original_title: Jake And Never Land Pirates: Jake Vs. Hook
overview: Get your treasure map, grab your sword, and join Jake And The Never Land Pirates as they face off against Hook and his crew in a must-own DVD overflowing with swashbuckling fun! The stakes are sky-high when Jake and the gang climb a giant beanstalk and find a crocodile that lays golden eggs. But look out- where there’s gold…there’s Hook! Then, soar above the clouds as Bucky transforms into a hot-air balloon to save Skybird Island from falling prey to Hook’s sneaky scheme. Jam-packed with action, magic and adventure, Jake vs Hook: The Ultimate Pirate Showdown proves little heroes can make a big difference!
title: Jake And Never Land Pirates: Jake Vs. Hook
